2. Fitzroy: 25,565 (now highest)

So the highest attendance among these is Fitzroy with 25,565, followed by North Melbourne at 21,237.

The claim is specifically about Footscray having the largest away attendance. But according to the numbers, Footscray had only 8,058 attendees, which is lower than both Fitzroy and North Melbourne.
